entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate Default Style Behaves Strangely #23225
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items #23220
  • FontImage not support woff2 format #23217
    Backlog
  • Flyout text dissappears after locking the screen #23214
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Margin and Padding don't work in CollectionView #23211
    Backlog
  • App refused by Apple with error ITMS-90338: Non-public API usage #23210
  • When in the Shell, HideSoftInputOnTapped does not work at Navigation.PushAsync(animated: false) in TapGestureRecognizer #23206
    Backlog

Closed

  • Setting a Style With TargetType="Border" Faults at Run Time #22862
    Backlog
  • Picking a lot of files with FilePicker is extremely slow on Windows, and can raise access exceptions on iOS #19868
    Backlog
  • Regression Issue: CollectionView SizeChanged does not work in SR6 but it works in SR5 (.NET 8) #23029
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Bad performance while using OData client vs using HttpClient on Android #23185
  • Installing MAUI workloads on Linux fails on read-only filesystems such as Flatpak #23219
  • [Windows] [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] App icon in the taskbar is pixelated #23212
  • [NET9] JavaCast not currently working on NET9 #23205
    9.0-preview6
  • iOS iPad Entry Control: Tab on an external keyboard does not move between UI Elements #20135
    Backlog
  • Error when trying to run myfirstapp on pixel device emulation #23192
  • I wanna create my self predictor aviator #23203
  • Looking for AndroidManifest.xml in /Android folder instead of /Platforms/Android #23207
  • App FlowDirection is restricted to device flow direction and doesn't respond to any changes #19506
  • Radio Button and CollectionView together do not work correctly #22913
  • [Logging] Logs with "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.xxxx" as namespace tossing off Warnings anyway. #22730
  • Crash on Android when hold app over 2 minutes in background #22284
  • Ambiguous route when PopModalAsync #21577

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete IBorder #23224
  • Renamed the project because macOS uses .app #23223
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    community ✨
  • Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2151.40` to `1.0.2592.51` #23209
    area-blazor, community ✨

Merged

  • VSCode no longer uses MAUI to launch #23222
  • Call base.OnResume if Existing NavigationFragment Early #23187
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow (#23169) #23218
  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow #23169
  • Simplify Development.md #23142
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • Avoid JavaCast + exceptions and instead just ask Java #23215
  • [iOS] Set WindowOverlay's GraphicsView to transparent input #23208
  • 8.0.61 release branding #23204

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
    area-infrastructure
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [Android] Android Ecosystem version bumps #23117
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Page and control Unloaded events - fix #23196
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
